_header: Ye that by this way pass
Title(s): O vos omnes qui transitis per viam
_description: O vos omnes qui transitis per viam

BLHar7322.Transcription: ȝe þat be þis wey paceabidid & behaldit my face& loket wer ani wo or pinemay be lienit nou to mine
BLHar7322.Note:
Written as prose inserted into Latin; Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943 incorrectly lists as on f. 54.
